<!-- AUTO-GENERATED: Header -->
# Core.Geo
> Address & Location Management
<!-- END AUTO-GENERATED -->

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED: Overview -->
## Overview

This module manages standard geographic entities.
It provides validation and lookup services for **Addresses**, **States**, and **Countries**.

### Key Features
-   **Address Standardization**: Ensures addresses have valid States/Countries.
-   **Zip Code Database**: Reference data for US/Canada postal codes.

<!-- END AUTO-GENERATED -->
